title: The Favorites - NFL Week 6 Betting Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 6 Betting Preview
description:
The Matt Rhule Era doesn't survive to Week 6, but our Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter return to preview all the games fit to bet on the NFL slate. Together they build their early cards, including a potential buy-now spot on the consistent Atlanta Falcons. Plus, are the surging Buffalo Bills the sharp side in Kansas City? #Volume #Herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
